verses.verse: And he began <S%G756><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> by the sea <S%G2281><s%> side: <S%G3844><s%> and there was gathered <S%G4863><s%> to him a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that he entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> and sat <S%G2521><s%> in the sea; <S%G2281><s%> and the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was by the sea <S%G2281><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the land. <S%G1095><s%>
And he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> them many <S%G4183><s%> things by parables, <S%G3850><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them in his doctrine, <S%G1322><s%>
Listen; <S%G191><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> there went <S%G1831><s%> out a sower <S%G4687><s%> to sow: <S%G4687><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as he sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side, <S%G3844><s%> and the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and devoured <S%G2719><s%> it up.

And some <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> stony <S%G4075><s%> ground, where <S%G3699><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> not much <S%G4183><s%> earth; <S%G1093><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> it sprang <S%G1816><s%> up, because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> depth <S%G899><s%> of earth: <S%G1093><s%>
But when the sun <S%G2246><s%> was up, it was scorched; <S%G2739><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> it withered <S%G3583><s%> away.

And some <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> thorns, <S%G173><s%> and the thorns <S%G173><s%> grew <S%G305><s%> up, and choked <S%G4846><s%> it, and it yielded <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

And other <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> and did yield <S%G1325><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> that sprang <S%G305><s%> up and increased; <S%G837><s%> and brought <S%G5342><s%> forth, <S%G5342><s%> some <S%G1520><s%> thirty, <S%G5144><s%> and some <S%G1520><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> and some <S%G1520><s%> an hundred. <S%G1540><s%>
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, He that has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>
And when <S%G3753><s%> he was alone, <S%G2651><s%> they that were about <S%G4012><s%> him with the twelve <S%G1427><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> of him the parable. <S%G3850><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, To you it is given <S%G1325><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but to them that are without, <S%G1854><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3588><s%> things are done <S%G1096><s%> in parables: <S%G3850><s%>

That seeing <S%G991><s%> they may see, <S%G991><s%> and not perceive; <S%G1492><s%> and hearing <S%G191><s%> they may hear, <S%G191><s%> and not understand; <S%G4920><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> any <S%G3379><s%> time <S%G3379><s%> they should be converted, <S%G1994><s%> and their sins <S%G265><s%> should be forgiven <S%G863><s%> them.

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Know <S%G1492><s%> you not this <S%G5026><s%> parable? <S%G3850><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> then will you know <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> parables? <S%G3850><s%>
The sower <S%G4687><s%> sows <S%G4687><s%> the word. <S%G3056><s%>

And these <S%G3778><s%> are they by the way <S%G3598><s%> side, <S%G3844><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> is sown; <S%G4687><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> they have heard, <S%G191><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> immediately, <S%G2112><s%> and takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> that was sown <S%G4687><s%> in their hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

And these <S%G3778><s%> are they likewise <S%G3668><s%> which are sown <S%G4687><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> stony <S%G4075><s%> ground; who, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they have heard <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> it with gladness; <S%G5479><s%>

And have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> root <S%G4491><s%> in themselves, <S%G1438><s%> and so endure <S%G2076><s%> but for a time: <S%G4340><s%> afterward, <S%G1534><s%> when affliction <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> rises <S%G1096><s%> for the word's <S%G3056><s%> sake, immediately <S%G2112><s%> they are offended. <S%G4624><s%>
And these <S%G3778><s%> are they which are sown <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> thorns; <S%G173><s%> such <S%G3778><s%> as hear <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%>

And the cares <S%G3308><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> and the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches, <S%G4149><s%> and the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of other <S%G3062><s%> things entering <S%G1531><s%> in, choke <S%G4846><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and it becomes <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

And these <S%G3778><s%> are they which are sown <S%G4687><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> ground; <S%G1093><s%> such <S%G3748><s%> as hear <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and receive <S%G3858><s%> it, and bring <S%G2592><s%> forth <S%G2592><s%> fruit, <S%G2592><s%> some <S%G1520><s%> thirty times, <S%G5144><s%> some <S%G1520><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> and some <S%G1520><s%> an hundred. <S%G1540><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Is a candle <S%G3088><s%> brought <S%G2064><s%> to be put <S%G5087><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bushel, <S%G3426><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bed? <S%G2825><s%> and not to be set <S%G2007><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a candlestick? <S%G3087><s%>

For there is nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> hid, <S%G2927><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall not be manifested; <S%G5319><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> was any <S%G5100><s%> thing kept <S%G1096><s%> secret, <S%G614><s%> but that it should come <S%G2064><s%> abroad. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5318><s%>
If any <S%G1536><s%> man have <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Take heed <S%G991><s%> what you hear: <S%G191><s%> with what <S%G3739><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> you mete, <S%G3354><s%> it shall be measured <S%G3354><s%> to you: and to you that hear <S%G191><s%> shall more <S%G4369><s%> be given. <S%G4369><s%>

For he that has, <S%G2192><s%> to him shall be given: <S%G1325><s%> and he that has <S%G2192><s%> not, from him shall be taken <S%G142><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he has. <S%G2192><s%>

And he said, <S%G3004><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> as if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> should cast <S%G906><s%> seed <S%G4703><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the ground; <S%G1093><s%>

And should sleep, <S%G2518><s%> and rise <S%G1453><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and day, <S%G2250><s%> and the seed <S%G4703><s%> should spring <S%G985><s%> and grow <S%G3373><s%> up, he knows <S%G1492><s%> not how. <S%G5613><s%>

For the earth <S%G1093><s%> brings <S%G2592><s%> forth <S%G2592><s%> fruit <S%G2592><s%> of herself; <S%G844><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> the blade, <S%G5528><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> the ear, <S%G4719><s%> after <S%G1534><s%> that the full <S%G4134><s%> corn <S%G4621><s%> in the ear. <S%G4719><s%>

But when the fruit <S%G2590><s%> is brought <S%G3860><s%> forth, <S%G3860><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> he puts <S%G649><s%> in the sickle, <S%G1407><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> is come. <S%G3936><s%>

And he said, <S%G3004><s%> Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall we liken <S%G3666><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> with what <S%G4169><s%> comparison <S%G3850><s%> shall we compare <S%G3846><s%> it?

It is like <S%G5613><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, <S%G4690><s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> when it is sown <S%G4687><s%> in the earth, <S%G1093><s%> is less <S%G3398><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the seeds <S%G4690><s%> that be in the earth: <S%G1093><s%>

But when it is sown, <S%G4687><s%> it grows <S%G305><s%> up, and becomes <S%G1096><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> herbs, <S%G3001><s%> and shoots <S%G4160><s%> out great <S%G3173><s%> branches; <S%G2798><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> may <S%G1410><s%> lodge <S%G2681><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the shadow <S%G4639><s%> of it.
And with many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> he the word <S%G3056><s%> to them, as they were able <S%G1410><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> it.

But without <S%G5565><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> <S%G2398><s%> he not to them: and when they were alone, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> he expounded <S%G1956><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And the same <S%G1565><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> when the even <S%G3798><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Let us pass <S%G1330><s%> over <S%G1330><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side. <S%G4008><s%>

And when they had sent <S%G863><s%> away <S%G863><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> they took <S%G3880><s%> him even as he was in the ship. <S%G4143><s%> And there were also with him other <S%G243><s%> little <S%G4142><s%> ships. <S%G4142><s%>

And there arose <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> storm <S%G2978><s%> of wind, <S%G417><s%> and the waves <S%G2949><s%> beat <S%G1911><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ship, <S%G4143><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that it was now <S%G2235><s%> full. <S%G1072><s%>

And he was in the hinder <S%G4403><s%> part of the ship, asleep <S%G2518><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a pillow: <S%G4344><s%> and they awake <S%G1326><s%> him, and say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> care <S%G3199><s%> you not that we perish? <S%G622><s%>

And he arose, <S%G1326><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the wind, <S%G417><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the sea, <S%G2281><s%> Peace, <S%G4623><s%> be still. <S%G5392><s%> And the wind <S%G417><s%> ceased, <S%G2869><s%> and there was a great <S%G3173><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> are you so <S%G3779><s%> fearful? <S%G1169><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> is it that you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%>

And they feared <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5401><s%> exceedingly, <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3173><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G686><s%> manner <S%G686><s%> of man is this, <S%G3778><s%> that even <S%G2532><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and the sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> him?
